unnormalised: **Home Loan Schemes Getting a Diwali Sparkle!**
normalised: home loan schemes getting a diwali sparkle!

unnormalised: Hey folks! Thinking of finally buying that dream *ghar* in Mumbai, or maybe a cozy apartment in Bangalore? Good news! Home loan schemes are looking pretty sweet right now, just in time for Diwali!
normalised: hey folks! thinking of finally buying that dream ghar in mumbai, or maybe a cozy apartment in bangalore? good news! home loan schemes are looking pretty sweet right now, just in time for diwali!

unnormalised: Several banks, including HDFC and SBI, are rolling out limited-time offers. We're talking reduced interest rates - some are even dipping below 7%!. Imagine saving serious *rupees* over 20 years!
normalised: several banks, including H D F C and S B I, are rolling out limited-time offers. we're talking reduced interest rates - some are even dipping below seven percent!. imagine saving serious rupees over twenty years!

unnormalised: Plus, processing fees are getting waived left, right, and center. Apparently, the festive season is the perfect time to snag a deal. Talk to your local branch before 31/10/2024 to see what they’re offering.
normalised: plus, processing fees are getting waived left, right, and center. apparently, the festive season is the perfect time to snag a deal. talk to your local branch before thirty first october two thousand and twenty four to see what they’re offering.

unnormalised: Experts say now's a good time to buy, especially if you’ve been eyeing a property near the new airport, which is projected for completion by 15/08/2025. Just remember to do your homework. Check that CIBIL score and compare all the schemes. Don't rush into anything, even if aunty Sharma keeps telling you about her amazing deal! Many offers close at 17:00 hrs so be on time. Happy house hunting, and Shubh Diwali!
normalised: experts say now's a good time to buy, especially if you’ve been eyeing a property near the new airport, which is projected for completion by fifteenth august two thousand and twenty five. just remember to do your homework. check that C I B I L score and compare all the schemes. don't rush into anything, even if aunty sharma keeps telling you about her amazing deal! many offers close at five P M so be on time. happy house hunting, and shubh diwali!
